```{r}
library(bio3d)
```
```{r}
fasta.seq <- read.fasta("fasta protein align.txt")
foxp3.matrix <- seqidentity(fasta.seq)
rownames(foxp3.matrix)
```
```{r}
jpeg(file="heatmap2.jpg")
heatmap(foxp3.matrix, margins=c(11, 11))

```

```{r}
es.annotate <- function(x){
ann <- pdb.annotate(x)
paste0(c("PDB Identifier: ", ann$structureId, " Method: ", ann$experimentalTechnique, " Resolution: ", ann$resolution, " Source: ", ann$source))}
es.annotate("2KIU")
```
```{r}
blast.pdb("Foxp3 Protein.txt")
pdb.annotate("Foxp3 Protein.txt")
```
